infobox.Japanese title:: 愚か者への遺産  (Orokamono e no Isan)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Kogoro Mouri  Ran Mouri  Jugo Yokomizo  Police detective
infobox.Animation director:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka  Seiji Muta
infobox.Character design:: Masatomo Sudo  Junko Yamanaka  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Wakana Yamazaki as Ran Mouri  Akira Kamiya as Kogoro Mouri  Akio Otsuka as Jugo Yokomizo  Kiyomitsu Mizuuchi as Police detective  Hiroshi Kawaguchi as Police detective  Ryuzo Hasuike as Debt collector A  Takuo Kawamura as Debt collector B  Orie Kimoto as Clerk  Osamu Kato as Hisaemon Yaguchi  Chihiro Suzuki as Kimio Yaguchi  Kazuki Yao as Akihiko Yaguchi  Kozo Shioya as Rokuro Yaguchi

sections.Situation:
While on a walk, Conan, Ran, and Kogoro heard a gunshot from a house in Kamakura. While heading to investigate, Kogoro was unable to catch a masked man that runs past them. Conan finds a dead man with dried blood and white powdery substance on his shirt.

The man, Hisaemon Yaguchi, is revealed to have died hours ago and his three sons are the suspects to the murder.

sections.Trivia:
- The weapon is a Winchester Model 37A Single Barreled Shotgun.
- Jugo's SUV is a 1996 Dark/nares Blue Pearl Metallic Mitsubishi Challenger [K90].
- The white sedan from two debt collectors is a Nissan Laurel (C34).
